GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object containing the selected user

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the selected article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing comments with the selected article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the given article's vote count and returns the updated article

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the given comment's vote count and returns the updated comment

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to the given article and returns the added comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes a comment from the database
